tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE unusual_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id UUID,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    transaction_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
amount DECIMAL,
transaction_time TIMESTAMP,
user_id INT,
location VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR,
email VARCHAR,
phone_number VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE locations (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
address VARCHAR,
zip_code INT,
city VARCHAR,
state VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE unusual_transactions (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
transaction_id INT,
user_id INT,
reason VARCHAR);

CREATE TABLE alerts (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
alert_time TIMESTAMP,
alert_type VARCHAR,
message VARCHAR,
resolved BOOLEAN);
